meanings.definition: A tropical plant of the hibiscus family, with red flowers and acid fruits.
meanings.sent1: The roselles in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I learned about roselles in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The roselles at the market looked like little red lanterns.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks were as red as roselles in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of roselles filled the air.

meanings.definition: The edible calyces of the roselle plant, used to make jellies and teas.
meanings.sent1: Grandma made delicious tea from dried roselles.
meanings.sent2: The roselles added a tangy flavor to the jelly.
meanings.sent3: The roselles giggled as they turned into tasty treats.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a jar of roselles opening.
meanings.sent5: The roselles danced in the boiling water, releasing their flavor.
